subtitle: The sweetness of this recipe combines wonderfully with savoury tastes.

method.text: Put the potatoes into boiling seasoned water. Cook for 20 min. Drain. Cool. Remove skins.
Cut potatoes into thick slices. Place in a roasting tin. Arrange the slices with apple rings and orange slices alternately between the potato slices.
Melt the butter. Blend with the orange rind, honey, nutmeg and orange juice. Brush over the sweet potatoes. Top with the fruit slices.
Cover the tin loosely with foil. Bake for 25-30 min.

title: Fruited sweet potatoes
